GameConditionDef.label: crystalline redshift
GameConditionDef.description: A colonist has succumbed to injuries sustained by a living crystal. The world chills and the sky reddens. All who witness this phenomenon will be saddened.
GameConditionDef.letterText: A foreboding redshift is occurring in the sky above.\n\nThe shift in colors will drag moods down and the day will be darker, the night even more so.

GameConditionDef.label: desert bloom weather shift
GameConditionDef.description: The desert has sprung to life after a long period of heat and drought.
GameConditionDef.endMessage: The rain is ending. The landscape has been transformed in glorious fashion.
GameConditionDef.letterText: A pleasant coolness fills the typically hot and dry air. Not far behind are water droplets. Their intensity grows and within minutes the sky sings a thunderous song of divine water droplets smashing against rock and stone. Almost instantly, plants not usually seen spring to life as their hibernation is interrupted by the deluge of water.
